battleships

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • battleships.Board

  • public class Board
extends Object
    Class witch manages the ship placement and current game situation on the game board.
    Author:
    strohm

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Board(int size)
      Constructor that constructs an empty game board where each int[x][y] coordinate of the board is 0.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void drawLineShip(int x, int y, Shipyard shipyard)
      Marks all the coordinates of the ship on the board as 1 meaning occupied.
      void drawlShip(int x, int y, Shipyard shipyard)
      Marks all the coordinates of the ship on the board as 1 meaning occupied.
      void drawUShip(int x, int y, Shipyard shipyard)
      Marks all the coordinates of the ship on the board as 1 meaning occupied.
      int[][] getBoard() 
      Map<String,Integer> getShips() 
      void setLine(Shipyard shipyard)
      Attempts to fit a 3 space line ship onto the board, if successful method calls drawLineShip(int x, int y, Shipyard shipyard).
      void setlShip(Shipyard shipyard)
      Attempts to fit a 5 space L-shaped ship onto the board, if successful method calls drawlShip(int x, int y, Shipyard shipyard).
      void setuShip(Shipyard shipyard)
      Attempts to fit a 7 space U-shape ship onto the board, if successful method calls drawuShip(int x, int y, Shipyard shipyard).

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Board

        public Board(int size)
        Constructor that constructs an empty game board where each int[x][y] coordinate of the board is 0.
        Parameters:
        size - determines the size of the XY board (size * size).

    • Method Detail

      • getShips

        public Map<String,Integer> getShips()
        Returns:
        a map of ships and their locations, where the keys are XY coordinates and the values are shipId's witch inhabit said coordinates. One ship may take the space of several neighbouring coordinates.

      • getBoard

        public int[][] getBoard()

      • setLine

        public void setLine(Shipyard shipyard)
        Attempts to fit a 3 space line ship onto the board, if successful method calls drawLineShip(int x, int y, Shipyard shipyard). After 100 failed attempts the method will end and the game will be absent one line ship.
        Parameters:
        shipyard - the shipyard where the line ship will be drawn.

      • setlShip

        public void setlShip(Shipyard shipyard)
        Attempts to fit a 5 space L-shaped ship onto the board, if successful method calls drawlShip(int x, int y, Shipyard shipyard). After 100 failed attempts the method will end and the game will be absent one L-shaped ship.
        Parameters:
        shipyard - the shipyard where the L-shape ship will be drawn.

      • setuShip

        public void setuShip(Shipyard shipyard)
        Attempts to fit a 7 space U-shape ship onto the board, if successful method calls drawuShip(int x, int y, Shipyard shipyard). After 100 failed attempts the method will end and the game will be absent one U-shaped ship.
        Parameters:
        shipyard - the shipyard where the U-shape ship will be drawn.

      • drawLineShip

        public void drawLineShip(int x,
                         int y,
                         Shipyard shipyard)
        Marks all the coordinates of the ship on the board as 1 meaning occupied. Puts all occupied coordinates into the ships map where key is coordinates and value is the ships individual shipId. afterwards method calls the given shipyards method buildShip(int shipId, int x, int y, String form) where form is "line".
        Parameters:
        x - coordinate x of ships head.
        y - coordinate y of ships head
        shipyard - shipyard where ship gets built.

      • drawlShip

        public void drawlShip(int x,
                      int y,
                      Shipyard shipyard)
        Marks all the coordinates of the ship on the board as 1 meaning occupied. Puts all occupied coordinates into the ships map where key is coordinates and value is the ships individual shipId. afterwards method calls the given shipyards method buildShip(int shipId, int x, int y, String form) where form is "lship".
        Parameters:
        x - coordinate x of ships head.
        y - coordinate y of ships head
        shipyard - shipyard where ship gets built.

      • drawUShip

        public void drawUShip(int x,
                      int y,
                      Shipyard shipyard)
        Marks all the coordinates of the ship on the board as 1 meaning occupied. Puts all occupied coordinates into the ships map where key is coordinates and value is the ships individual shipId. afterwards method calls the given shipyards method buildShip(int shipId, int x, int y, String form) where form is "uship".
        Parameters:
        x - coordinate x of ships head.
        y - coordinate y of ships head
        shipyard - shipyard where ship gets built.
